Shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. If thirty-nine or more cards or more were shuffled into your library this way, you may cast any number of cards in your hand without paying their mana costs.

cards.rules_text:
Itami can’t block and can’t be blocked.
Whenever Itami deals combat damage to a player, each player discards a card. Put a +1/+1 counter on Itami if you discarded the card with the highest mana value among those cards or tied for highest.

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control if that spell was green. Creatures you control gain menace and haste until end of turn if that spell was red. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn if that spell was white.

Ward—Pay 3 life.

Trample

This creature gets +1/+1 for each color among spells you’ve cast this turn.

At the beginning of your end step, you may exile a card from your graveyard.  Create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying if you exiled an instant or sorcery card this way. If you exiled another type this way, create a 3/3 colorless Homunculus creature token.

At the beginning of your end step, you may return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it, where X is the number of creatures that died under your control this turn.
